plot: A colorful dramatization of a documented incident in the early life of Will Rogers. When trouble erupts in Rogers' Oklahoma hometown, 22-year-old Will is made deputy to help calm the disturbances.
title: Will Rogers: Champion of the People
plot_es: A colorful dramatization of a documented incident in the early life of Will Rogers. When trouble erupts in Rogers' Oklahoma hometown, 22-year-old Will is made deputy to help calm the disturbances.
original_name: Will Rogers: Champion of the People
